sentences.en: Above the stratosphere is the stratopause.
Above the troposphere is the stratosphere, followed by the ionosphere and capped by the exosphere.
sentences.cn: 在对流层上是平流层, 接着是电离层,最上层是外逸层.

sentences.en: Although ground - level ozone is considered a harmful pollutant, the ozone layer in the stratosphere is beneficial.
sentences.cn: 尽管地表的臭氧被看成是有害的污染物, 但平流层里的臭氧层却是有益的.

sentences.en: Chlorofluorocarbons and hydrochloroflorocarbons are oxidated in the stratosphere and troposphere respectively.
sentences.cn: 两类物质分别在同温层和对流层氧化降解.

sentences.en: Energy and commodity prices were heading into the stratosphere.
sentences.cn: 能源和大宗商品价格直冲而上.

sentences.en: Impact of monsoon circulations on the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere.
sentences.cn: 季风环流对对流层上部和平流层下部的影响.

sentences.en: In the early 1960 s a worldwide aerosol band was discovered in the lower stratosphere at 17 - 24 km.
sentences.cn: 在六十年代初期,在17-24公里平流层下部发现世界范围气溶胶带.

sentences.en: Man – made CFCs are the main cause of ozone depletion in the stratosphere.
sentences.cn: 人造氯氟烃是臭氧层破坏的主因.

sentences.en: Most of the chlorofluoromethanes reside in the lower stratosphere.
sentences.cn: 大多数氯氟甲烷存留在平流层下部.

sentences.en: Oil prices soared into the stratosphere .
Ozone is formed in the stratosphere and mesosphere by photochemical processes.
sentences.cn: 由于光化过程,在平流层与中层内产生了臭氧.

sentences.en: The stratosphere is the layer above the troposphere and extends to about 50 km.
sentences.cn: 平流层是从对流层顶向上延伸到50千米高空的界层.

sentences.en: This was enough to launch their careers into the stratosphere.
sentences.cn: 这足以让他们的事业平步青云了。

sentences.en: Volcanic aerosols have a lifetime of about a year in the stratosphere.
sentences.cn: 火山灰在同温层大约有一年的寿命.

sentences.en: We shall turn you into gas and pour you into the stratosphere.
sentences.cn: 我们要把你挤空,然后再把我们自己填充你.

sentences.en: Why is stratosphere suitable for the plane to fly?
sentences.cn: 为什么平流层适合飞机飞行?
